transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good morning, this is Rachel Green calling from Financial Services. May I speak with Michael?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you. I'm calling about your account ending in 7823. There's a balance of $925 that's currently 45 days past due.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Oh right, I've been meaning to take care of that. Can I pay half now and half next month?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me check what options we have. Yes, I can set up a two-payment plan for you. When would you like to make the first payment?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Can we do it on the 15th? That's when I get paid.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Absolutely. I'll schedule $462.50 for the 15th of this month and the remaining balance for the 15th of next month. Does that work for you?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're welcome. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly with all the details. Have a great day!
